department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 近年來由於資訊科技的普及與發達，使得數位傳播理論、數位科技與新興教育科技技術融入於教育現場、各式生活情景中，則為一重要的議題。本課程目標，除為能增進學生對科技傳播議題的理解外，此外也盼能透過閱讀、報告的呈現，促進其對於創新教育科技議題、未來應用趨勢的進一步認識。
goal.en:
< To enroll in this course, students must have at least a B2 level of Chinese proficiency.>

In recent years, the widespread development of information technology has led to the integration of digital communication theories, digital technologies, and emerging educational technologies into educational settings and various life scenarios, making it an important issue. The goal of this course is not only to enhance students‘ understanding of technology communication topics but also to promote further awareness of innovative educational technology issues and future application trends through reading and report presentations.

outline.ch: 本課程主要學習活動包含文章閱讀與口頭報告。每週上課前，學生需要閱讀課程中指定的閱讀內容，並在課堂中針對閱讀內容進行口頭報告。課堂中學生與老師也將針對相關議題進行討論，期末學生則需要針對其蒐集到的相關資料進行統整性分析。
outline.en:
< To enroll in this course, students must have at least a B2 level of Chinese proficiency.>
The main learning activities of this course include reading articles and oral presentations. Before each class, students are required to read the assigned materials, and during class, they will deliver oral reports on the reading content. In class, students and the instructor will also engage in discussions on related topics. By the end of the course, students will need to conduct a comprehensive analysis of the relevant materials they have gathered.
